mapper.select: SELECT b.num, b.title, u.name, b.date, b.count, b.contents, b.id, b.atch_file_id, f.ori_name FROM b_board as b INNER join b_users as u ON (b.id = u.id) inner join b_filedetail as f on (b.atch_file_id = f.atch_file_id) WHERE del_chk = 'N' ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT b.num, b.title, u.name, date_format(b.date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, b.count, b.id FROM b_board as b INNER join b_users as u ON (b.id = u.id) WHERE del_chk = 'N' ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM b_board WHERE del_chk = 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT b.num, b.title, u.name, b.date, b.count, b.contents, b.id, b.atch_file_id FROM b_board as b INNER join b_users as u ON (b.id = u.id) inner join b_filemaster as m on (b.atch_file_id = m.atch_file_id) WHERE del_chk = 'N' AND num = #{num} ORDER BY num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_board (title, contents, id, atch_file_id) VALUES (#{title},#{contents},#{id},#{atch_file_id})
mapper.delete: UPDATE b_board SET del_chk = 'Y' WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM b_board as b INNER JOIN b_users as u ON (b.id = u.id) WHERE del_chk = 'N'

ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
